attributes.action: Get Rid of Scottish, Welsh and Irish MP's From Parliament
attributes.additional_details: I call on the government to get rid of Scottish, Welsh and Irish MP's from the House of Commons. Only english MP's should be representing us in the House of Commons.

rejection.details:
Please see:

Petition Title: If Scotland votes Yes to independence Scottish MPs should be withdrawn from the UK Parliament by no later than the May 2015 General Election

Created by: Antony Brown

Closing: 10/12/2014
